# Graph discussion

```{r}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("hodgettsp/cesR")
library(cesR)
library(dplyr)
library(labelled)
get_cescodes()
get_ces("ces2019_web")
ces2019_web <- to_factor(ces2019_web)
library("tidyverse")
ces2019_web %>% ggplot(aes(x=cps19_province)) + geom_bar()
```
